nodes.text: The Treema Courthouse and Detention Area was a jail in Treema, the capital city of Klatooine. Ben Skywalker and Vestara Khai were held here in 44 ABY, along with the psychotic Force-sensitive Dyon Stadd, after Stadd nearly disrupted the sacred Fountain of the Ancients. They were soon released by Skywalker's and Khai's respective fathers, Luke and Gavar.
